attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My tax credit allowance in this Economic downturn has been reduced from over 80 Pounds per week to mere 47 Pounds per week. 

If the PM is serious about helping the small businesses then he should look into it immediately.

Please look into my situation immediately and do something about those beneficiaries of tax credits who are trying to make both ends meet.

rejection.details: Individual cases are a matter for direct communication with the relevant department or agency.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
